Hope we find a way to keep this going, somewhat, somehow, so we'll be ready for 2022. I cherished those moments, and so the journey. Tomorrow is first Monday of the year, we're back to grinding.

"Big future comes from small city"

 It is an honor for us to be trusted to collaborate on good.  @grabid in collaboration with @officialemtek_grup and @bukalapak launched a future city program aimed at developing digital potential in small cities in Indonesia so that it is more optimal in its development.  The jargon used this time is also out of the box "Big future comes from small city", proving Grab Indonesia's commitment to make the pace of development in small cities much more progressive.

 At the @ideafestid talkshow this time I collaborated with Mrs. @tirzareinata Director of general public affairs @grabid and Mas Wiliam Christiansen founder of @space.roastery to share how we carry out digital transformation so that in challenging times we can survive and even thrive.

 If we CAN, of course all of our friends CAN too, so keep an eye on the development of future city programs and make sure you are a part of the development of a better Indonesia :)

 "BIG FUTURE COMES FROM SMALL CITY"

 -------------

"Big future comes from small city"

Adalah suatu kehormatan bagi kami dipercaya untuk berkolaborasi dalam kebaikan. @grabid bekerja sama dengan @officialemtek_grup dan @bukalapak meluncurkan program kota masa depan yang ditujukan untuk mengembangkan potensi digital di kota-kota kecil di Indonesia agar lebih optimal dalam perkembangannya. Jargon yang digunakan kali ini juga out of the box "Big future comes from small city", membuktikan komitment grab Indonesia untuk menjadikan laju perkembangan di kota kecil untuk jauh lebih progressif.

Pada talkshow @ideafestid kali ini saya berkolaborasi dengan Ibu @tirzareinata Director of general public affair @grabid dan Mas Wiliam Christiansen founder @space.roastery untuk menceritakan Bagaimana kami melakukan transformasi digital sehingga pada masa-masa penuh tantangan kita dapat tetap bertahan bahkan berkembang.

Kalau kita BISA tentu teman-teman semuanya juga BISA, untuk itu pantau terus perkembangan program kota masa depan dan Pastikan kamu adalah salah satu bagian dalam perkembangan Indonesia menjadi lebih baik :)

"BIG FUTURE COMES FROM SMALL CITY"

Ten years as the largest creative festival in Indonesia, IdeaFest will be held again on 26 -28 November 2021. Presenting a series of inspiring profiles from various creative fields across industries and featuring more than 140 inspirational figures and 60 educational sessions with topics relevant to the development of the creative industry at the moment.

Looking at the current changing situation that is heading in a better direction as well as very rapid technological advances, IdeaFest 2021 tries to respond to these changes by presenting a completely new creative festival experience in a hybrid way. IdeaFest 2021 inspirational sessions can also be watched live at M Bloc Space.

To fill the most awaited virtual conference stage, IdeaFest presented big names from home and abroad, including Tablo (Rapper, Producer, Songwriter, and Author), Kevin Kwan (Author of Crazy Rich Asians), Yvett Merino (Producer of Disney's ‚ÄúEncanto‚Äù), Byron Howard (Director of Disney's ‚ÄúEncanto‚Äù), Raffi Ahmad (Founder & Chairman of RANS Entertainment), Ridwan Kamil (Governor of West Java), Content and Creative, Disney+, The Walt Disney Company Southeast Asia), and some other big names.

IdeaFest also presents a series of other inspirational figures such as Brian McGinn, Cecilia Soojeong Yi, Dian Sastrowardoyo, Jerome Kurnia, Wregas Bhanuteja, Afutami, Max Mandias, Sal Priadi, Sulaiman Said, Zico Halim, and many more.

With the spirit of Never Quit and the IdeaFest theme "The Future of X" which has the same meaning, it is hoped that it can build a strong generation in Indonesia and can become the latest reference for creative people and create cross-industry collaboration, Samara Live as the organizer consistently presents IdeaFest as a space for exchanging inspiration between Indonesian creative people.

Seorang kakek, Iber Djamal (80 tahun), bagian dari sebuah masyarakat adat di tengah Kalimantan, menggunakan sisa hidupnya untuk meyelamatkan hutan adat terakhir di desanya. 

Pulau Barasak merupakan kawasan hutan terakhir di Desa Pilang, Kalimantan Tengah, setelah yang lainnya mengalami kebakaran dan diprivatisasi beberapa perusahaan. Iber mencoba menempuh jalan legal terbaik untuk melindungi hutan dengan berupaya mendapatkan sertifikat hutan adat yang sah untuk sisa hutan di wilayahnya. Tapi keluarga dan masyarakat desanya pikir, ia terlalu tua untuk melawan.

An interesting discussion with @ridwankamil  at the IdeaFest 2021 conference, give us another Xcitement.

"The COVID-19 crisis teaches us who can adapt is the one who can survive." A sentence that makes us realize that we have to keep moving.

Ridwan Kamil says he likes to improve public spaces, he wants to provide more open spaces so people can enjoy outdoor activity and work more creatively.

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

We are delighted to have had such an amazing discussion with @kevinkwanbooks. He talked a lot about his journey in making his book. We are so grateful for our partner @bukugpu to invite him here.

"Everyone can write, it just takes time and determination. When you are ready then you must do, luck and timing is important." That's what he thought.

He believes, Asian works are starting to dominate. Even, we still have a long way to go, but now many Asian actors, actresses, singers and even comedians are improving.

It's incredible that we're slowly bringing in a new era for Asia's future. We need many works that can bring Asia to the world. Keep in mind, everything is like a challenge, so there are many things we can do. Face the unXpected and find your future of X.

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

Being privileged is not always fun, there is a burden to be borne there. @putri_tanjung's father always encouraged her to start her own business without any help. She is well aware that the privilege she has should be used wisely.

She wishes to continue work and contribute for many people. So, while most people believe that privilege is something extraordinary, but in fact it is not only for ourselves but also for others. Thank you for coming at IdeaFest conference @putri_tanjung and we are very grateful @idelaju for helping us make this unforgetable conference session.

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

Work-life balance is a hard state to reach, and the majority of us might feel burned out. In this session, @hanamadness explains us how to face it.

"Self-reflection is very important when we are burned out, it's time to look back when we faced difficult times. Make it an encouragement to be better. Keep in mind that the situation is not good, it's only temporary and it will be better in the future if we can get through it!"

Feeling burned out is normal, but we have to control how we react to it! 

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

But, as a professional athlete, how do you keep motivated? 

"Train the mind and see everything from the positive side of whatever happens, healthy mind, discipline, and confident so that we can survive and never quit." Gagarin Nathaniel said.

It isn't easy to face the UnXpected, but it is important to keep ourselves positive and ready!

*the woman was too stunned to speak* ngga nyangka lho, sabtu kemarin aku bisa #literally dikasih panggung. 

di sofa orange itu, aku berkesempatan sharing pengalaman, tips, dan cerita. di sofa orange itu, tempat dimana @therealdisastr duduk and sharing juga sehari sebelumnya #lho

di moment itu, aku mewakili jutaan tiktok creators indo hebat buat sharing pengalaman storytellingku & membuat engaging brand videos di aplikasi tsb. 

kalo dipikir-pikir (tepatnya moment sebelum aku naik panggung), it hit me, ini beneran honor sih. 

bukan karena aku jd ngerasa yg terbaik, karena justru masih banyak yg lain yg lebih jago dari aku. jadi hopefully, i did y‚Äôall justice on stage!

buat yg miss panelnya, intinya adalah storytelling is powerful and it‚Äôs even more so on tiktok. both are great tools, so you them wisely~

anyway, dari yang awalnya iseng bikin video trending, sampe nemu niche sendiri, dan akhirnya bisa jadi panel di @ideafestid. semuanya mulai dari satu aplikasi yang ajaib ini

buat #besties yg dapet kesempatan baik, mau kamu takut, pusing, ngga PD, atau anxious, menurut aku sih bilang aja iya dulu. ini sih value yg aku pegang sejak aku kuliah. jalanin aja, kan gatau nanti apa yg bisa dateng (dari pada nyesel!!)

huge huge thanks to @celinahidajat for inviting me and @megabalqizs for moderating the panel discussion, semoga bisa sharing-sharing lagi soon!!!üíô‚ú®

To improve the quality of the Indonesian series, collaboration is highly needed. We must strive to be better, starting with good storytelling through cinematic; now, Indonesian series are approaching a good quality as good as the quality of big-screen films.

On 27 November, Lenny Susanti (Brand Partnership Lead, TikTok) alongside Arindam Bhattacharyya (Chief Strategy Officer Dentsu), Alicia Serena (Content Creator at TikTok) and Mega Balqizs (Agency Partnership Lead, TikTok) share their insights about ‚ÄòStorytelling With The TikTok Community‚Äô in their IdeaTalks session.

In this session from TikTok, Lenny told us that there are some ways for us to embrace creative management on TikTok, especially for brands that are just starting to explore the platform:
1. You can collaborate with creators
2. Amplify existing conversation about your brand
3. Find your voice to fully become a member of the community
Lenny also highlighted many advantages that TikTok offered creators to express their stories & feelings toward content creation. Such an insightful session!

#IdeaFest #IdeaFest2021 #TheFutureofX

Whatever you want to do in #TheFutureofX, health is an integral part to make sure you can make them happen.¬†

@artikasaridevi, Vera Galuh Sugijanto, and I discussed how health is the most important investment that we can make.¬†

Not just to ensure that our future generations will have the best quality of life since their first 1.000 days, but also to ensure that we will still be able to have a sound body and mind once we aged.

A healthy lifestyle, according to Vera, is one of the best legacy that we can give to our children.

What‚Äôs your Xperience in managing your physical and mental health?

Thank you, @ideafestid for trusting me to moderate again this year!

The IdeaFest's Rewind will available at jagat.live start from 30 November - 30 December 2021.

Remember, the future belongs to those who never quit.

Tablo Epik High ( @blobyblo ) baru saja membagikan pemikirannya soal The Future of Music: How Kpop Has and Will Change the World di acara IdeaFest 2021 yang digelar pada Minggu, 28 November 2021. Musisi asal Korea Selatan ini menyuguhkan perspektif baru soal musik Kpop yang kini mendunia.

Sejak kecil, Tablo Epik High sudah sering tinggal berpindah-pindah negara seperti pernah menetap di Indonesia, Hong Kong, Kanada, hingga Amerika Serikat. Dari situlah, sudut pandangnya mengenai suatu hal menjadi beragam.

Resmi debut ke industri musik sejak 1997, Tablo Epik High telah melewati beberapa generasi musik di Korea Selatan. Perkembangan tersebut membawa Kpop menjadi tren baru di dunia dari segala aspek.

Penasaran dengan perspektif unik Tablo Epik High tentang popularitas Kpop sekarang? Yuk klik link di bio untuk simak artikel selengkapnya!

#ideafest2021 #tabloepikhigh #zigidotid

Seorang kakek, Iber Djamal (77 tahun), bagian dari sebuah masyarakat adat di tengah Kalimantan, menggunakan sisa hidupnya untuk meyelamatkan hutan adat terakhir di desanya. 

Pulau Barasak merupakan kawasan hutan terakhir di Desa Pilang, Kalimantan Tengah, setelah yang lainnya mengalami kebakaran dan diprivatisasi beberapa perusahaan. Iber mencoba menempuh jalan legal terbaik untuk melindungi hutan dengan berupaya mendapatkan sertifikat hutan adat yang sah untuk sisa hutan di wilayahnya. Tapi keluarga dan masyarakat desanya pikir, ia terlalu tua untuk melawan.

Raffi Ahmad diundang menjadi pembicara dalam IdeaFest 2021 dalam konferensi bertajuk Fund Follow Followers: Social Influence as the New Currency for Entrepreneur pada Minggu, 28 November 2021. Kali ini, suami Nagita Slavina itu membahas soal perusahan media dan hiburan miliknya, RANS Entertainment ( @rans.entertainment ).

RANS Entertainment sendiri baru beroperasi selama 3-4 tahun terakhir. Bisnis milik Raffi Ahmad ini selalu mendapat sorotan karena telah memproduksi berbagai konten menarik hingga kini menjadi salah satu perusahaan yang diperhitungan di Indonesia.

Seiring berjalannya waktu, Raffi Ahmad menyadari betapa besar tanggung jawab yang dimiliki karena memiliki jumlah followers hampir 57,2 juta di Instagram. Seperti apa cerita Raffi Ahmad dalam memproduksi konten yang bermanfaat dan positif bagi masyarakat di bawah RANS Entertainment? Klik link di bio!

To be ready for whatever #TheFutureofX brings, first we must know ourselves and our purpose. Only then will we be able to weather every unXpected thing and give our life meaning.

In this session, Farwiza Farhan, Sabrina Anggraini, Andini Aska, and Marchella FP discussed how each of their passion lead them to go on a process to discover their purpose, without comparing themselves with other people. As a passionate learner, I do love coming to creative conferences just to feel the energy and spike of knowledges. Since pandemic, we've lost the touch of having this public gathering and conversing with many people. So I dedicated a moment by standing in this box from the first ever hybrid conference I attended yesterday üòå‚úåÔ∏è‚ú® 

I chose to attend a talk of the most unfamiliar-familiar topic that tickles my curiosity; "NFT & The New Economy". To witness such discussion with little knowledge and zero experience, I've taken some keywords home and made those a homeworküòÇ. That was a really good way to start a journey to find out "who's and what's"  about the hit topic. They presented awesome speakers: illustrator to director of art media to NFT artist. This breakout topic has driven a lot of creators to make it in the digital world, but the lack of research and self-responsibility could create a set of troubles. A fast "new-born-baby" trend of technology has to be studied wisely. We cannot quickly judge or jump in without knowing what it can do and why we need to do it. The future is here and it's a fast paced. To join in, we must find out more within the community or simply consult with a friend. They suggest it wisely enough. 

It was trully an awesome one hour session! If you guys happened to be around South Jakarta, go ahead and check out offline session of @ideafestid ‚úèÔ∏è at @mblocspace üìçand get those tickets! üôåüèºüòÅ.

virtually at @jagat.live on 28 November 2021 at 16.35!

We know that NFT (Non-fungible Token) is becoming one of the most talked-about topics lately. The question arise, to those unfamiliar, what is NFT?

Music, game, tweet? Does tweet counts as NFTs? Actually, yes! NFT or Non-fungible Token is a digital asset that depicts real-world elements like art, music, in-games items, and films. They‚Äôre bought and traded online, often using cryptocurrency, and they‚Äôre usually encoded with the same software as many other cryptos.
